title.bibl: Svornost, April 21st, 1879. [Sokol Society Gives "Zmatek Nad Zmatek"]

div.bibl: SVORNOST, April 21st, 1879. [SOKOL SOCIETY GIVES "ZMATEK NAD ZMATEK"]

body.p: The farce "Zmatek nad Zmatek" (Error upon Error) was performed in the hall of "Telocviene Jednota Sokol" (Gymnastic Society Sokol.) The acting was carried out in such a manner as to indicate that our actors need more time to familiarize themselves with comedy.
The performance seemed to incline throughout to the tragic. It became monotonous and somewhat gloomy in spots.
Even at that, the play was quite humorous and brought forth considerable laughter from an enthusiastic public.
